body.name: Ergonomic Wireless Mouse, Wireless Vertical Mouse 2.4GHz Optical Mice with Adjustable DPI 800/1200/1600 for Small Hands,Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 1 hr 9 mins
features: 【Ergonomic Vertical Design】Encourage healthy natural “handshake” wrist and palm position for the most comfortable grip, less wrist strain. The ergonomically- designed thumb rests and grips fit the contour of your palm for maximum comfort, perfect for small hands.The surface of the mouse is sprayed with rubber oil, which is very comfortable to touch.This mouse is very suitable for people with RSI or customers who use the mouse for a long time.
【Easy to use】Just plug the included USB receiver into the USB port of your computer, no other additional software needed.(the receiver is at the bottom of the mouse) Operation distance up to 10m.

【Automatic sleep function】 The sleeping function is for saving energy, it goes to sleep when you are not using it for 8 minutes, and you only need to click any button on the mouse once, it should be back to work.

【3 Adjustable DPI】DPI800/1200/1600,the higher DPI, the faster the cursor on your screen will move.adjust DPI according to your needs.Added next / previous buttons provide convenience when web surfing.

【Wide Compatibility】Compatible with Windows 7/10/XP/CE/vista, Windows2000,Android ,Vista and Linux etc(NOT FOR MAC OS).We offer 12 months warranty for our Product,Please feel free to contact us, if you have any questions.
body.description: WHY CHOOSE A ERGONOMIC MOUSE? Ergonomic Design - Release Your Wrist Pressure Maximum Ordinary mouse: Using an ordinary mouse for prolonged periods of time easily leads to fatigue and pain of the arm and even injury of arm joints. Ergonomic vertical mouse: The mouse allows the palm to be closer to the desktop and allows the wrist and arm to remain in their natural position. It is scientifically proven to reduce your muscle strain. 1. Vertical mouse, Wrist in natural state 2. Normal mouse, Arm twisted

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: SUNGI WIRELESS ERGONOMIC VERTICAL MOUSE RIGHT HAND FOR COMPUTER PC LAPTOP DESKTOP Ergonomic design, the grip gesture in a natural state, release your wrist pressure maximum.This mouse is our own mode and produced by our factory directly, we can control quality well from raw material, also we do double quality checking before shipment to make sure it will bring great experience to your users.The mouse adopting advanced 2.4G wireless transmission technology, plug and play, no need install any drives, just insert USB dongle to your device you can enjoy it freely.The working distance up to 10m max, and stable signal, it will not disconnect with a long distance from device.
PLUG AND PLAY Just plug the included USB receiver into the USB port of your computer, no other additional software needed.(the receiver is at the bottom of the mouse)

Encourage healthy natural “handshake” wrist and palm position for the most comfortable grip, less wrist strain. The ergonomically- designed thumb rests and grips fit the contour of your palm for maximum comfort, perfect for small hands.The surface of the mouse is sprayed with rubber oil, which is very comfortable to touch.This mouse is very suitable for people with RSI or customers who use the mouse for a long time. WHY CHOOSE A ERGONOMIC MOUSE? Ergonomic Design - Release Your Wrist Pressure Maximum Ordinary mouse: Using an ordinary mouse for prolonged periods of time easily leads to fatigue and pain of the arm and even injury of arm joints. Ergonomic vertical mouse: The mouse allows the palm to be closer to the desktop and allows the wrist and arm to remain in their natural position. It is scientifically proven to reduce your muscle strain. 1. Vertical mouse, Wrist in natural state 2. Normal mouse, Arm twisted

5 Million Mouse Clicks The high-quality optical wireless mouse has been tested for over 5 million mouse clicks. And the good raw materials makes this wireless mouse more durable. Adjustable DPI DPI 800/1200/1600, the higher DPI, the faster the cursor on your screen will move. adjust DPI according to your needs. Forward and Back Buttons The mouse designed with forward and backward buttons, you can click this two shortcut buttons to return or go ahead web page directly. AAA Battery The mouse powered by 2pcs AAA battery(battery not included for shipment), the mouse is designed with a very low power consumption.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Carpal tunnel pain not worsened!
reviews.reviewText: I love this mouse! Most comfortable mouse I have ever used. I would never use another style ever again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Surprisingly good.. My right hand was locking up, and this was more ergonomic. I use it for gaming also, so it didn't really make too much of a negative impact.Currently, I would rather just use the mouse with my left hand unless I have a competitive reason to switch to my right hand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Loud click, nice feel on your fingers, good for small hands
reviews.reviewText: Pros:- Material on your hands feels silky. Great feel.- Scroll wheel works nicely.- Tracking is fine.- Battery rather than recharge, which I like because all of the recharging ones die within a year- On/Off switch to save your battery- Excellent for smaller hands. I wear women's gloves size S, and this fits my hands really well.Cons:- The click. I have a thing with clicks. It's maddening to hear yourself click loudly all day. If the click were silent, this would be the perfect mouse. Maybe I'm a little neurotic, but it's distracting for me.Neutral:- The LED light near your thumb is small. I don't know why so many of mice have light strips. It seems like something else to use up the battery. I'd prefer to not have any lights, outside of what's necessary underneath for a track light. Not a big deal, and better than most.Other:- Made In China- 6D Optical Mouse- Takes 2 AAA Batteries

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I had this less than three weeks and the roller broke, and I was unable to return it. I wrote a review initially and someone reached out to me, offering me a $40 gift card to remove the review and so I did that. After a few email exchanges it became apparent. It was spam, and they were not going follow through. Suspect at best BEWARE!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I bought this again!
reviews.reviewText: Small and fit to my hand.Smooth scrolling and navigating.And amazing price. I broke this by my bad and bought this again immediately.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this mouse to use at the office. I loved that it was small for my small hands. A few weeks back, I noticed the cursor randomly timing out and disappearing from my screen. This would happen when the mouse is not in use. I would have to turn the mouse on and off for the cursor to appear on my screen (doing this a few times a day). Annoying, yes, but I was going to put up with it. However, two weeks ago, the scroller broke and is not usable anymore. That was a problem because my job requires me to review numerous pages within a document. I was hoping to return this item but fell a couple of weeks outside the return window. For the price of this mouse, it's not worth buying.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great comfy mouse

reviews.reviewerName: La caja del producto no vino como se mostraba ni decia…. Era en una caja de madera

reviews.reviewText: Excelente el producto, super estable, exacto y sobre todo los mandos… y ni hablar por ese precio
